Question: After only four weeks without this person, 60 Minutes lost 20 percent of its audience.
Hints: CBS management then decided that it was in the best interest of the network to have this person return immediately.
This person made a number of comments which elicited strong reactions from fans and producers alike.
Andrew Aitken "Andy" this person (January 14, 1919 – November 4, 2011) was an American radio and television writer.
